title: Permanent Paper Sign
description:
The symbol for infinity enclosed within a circle or square.

Originally encoded as a symbol to represent acid-free paper, this permanent paper sign was later given emoji presentation to form an infinity emoji.

May also be used by members of the autism rights movement to represent neurodiversity.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
apple_vendor_description: The infinity emoji on Apple devices is a beautifully rendered, continuous loop, designed with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that gives it a luminous and ethereal quality. Its smooth, unbroken curve catches light with subtle highlights, symbolizing endlessness, eternal love, or boundless possibilities, all with the polished aesthetic unique to Apple's design language. This emoji, appearing sleek and dynamic on Apple devices, is a popular way to express everlasting feelings or concepts without limits.
